# statusBarFrame

**Instance Property**

The frame rectangle of the status bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var statusBarFrame: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The frame rectangle is in the coordinate space of the associated [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindowScene] object. If the status bar is hidden, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGRectZero].
title: statusBarFrame
